description: Gooey baked brie stacked on crisp pastry and topped with blueberries makes an elegant appetiser for any event.
name: Blueberry & Cheese Filo Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Combine blueberries, cornflour, lemon juice and 1 tsp maple syrup in a small bowl. Microwave on high for 1 minute, stirring halfway through, or until mixture has slightly thickened.

Place 1 sheet of filo on the prepared tray. Brush with a little butter and sprinkle with a little cinnamon sugar. Top with a second sheet, arranging in the opposite direction to the first and brush with a little butter and sprinkle with a little cinnamon sugar. Repeat with the remaining sheet of filo arranging in the same direction as the first filo sheet and brushing with a little butter and sprinkling with a little cinnamon sugar.

Place brie in the centre of the filo stack. Using kitchen scissors and leaving the brie in the centre, cut filo stack crossways and lengthways into 4 quarters. Spoon blueberry mixture over brie. Scrunch and roll filo around brie to form a pie ‘crust’. Brush filo with remaining butter and sprinkle with remaining cinnamon sugar.
Bake for 12 minutes or until the filo is golden. Stand for 5 minutes to cool slightly. Drizzle with remaining maple syrup. Serve.
